```{r}
Temperatura_celsius <- c( 20.1, 23.1, 30.6, 32.3, 31.7, 5, 21.1, 27.4, 21.3, 29,
 19.8, 15.3, 28.7, 25.1, 14.3, 23.3, 28.7, 17.7, 30.3, 26.7, 26.2, 11.4, 25.5, 15, 23.8,
 23.9, 16.2, 26, 12.7, 32.8, 19.2, 37.2, 10.3, 25, 14.9, 30.9, 19, 23.64, 24.1, 13.1,
 17.6, 31.9, 25.7, 13.6, 21.6, 14.4, 29.5, 7.75, 33.7, 35.2)
```

```{r}
summary(Temperatura_celsius)
```

```{r}
Temp_ord <- sort(Temperatura_celsius); (Temp_ord)
cte <- 9
```

```{r}
indices <- 1:10; (indices)
t <- cte*indices; (t)
```

```{r}
mis_deciles <- Temp_ord[t]; (mis_deciles)
cuantiles <- quantile(Temperatura_celsius); (cuantiles)
Q1 <- cuantiles[2]; (Q1)
Q2 <- cuantiles[3]; (Q2)
Q3 <- cuantiles[4]; (Q3)
```

```{r}
x_media <- mean(Temperatura_celsius);(x_media)
mi_min <- min(Temperatura_celsius); (mi_min)
mi_max <- max(Temperatura_celsius); (mi_max)
varianza <- var(Temperatura_celsius); (varianza) 
DesvEst <- sd(Temperatura_celsius); (DesvEst)
```

```{r}
plot(
  Temperatura_celsius,
  main = "Temperatura en Grados Celcius",
  xlab = "Temperatura ",
  ylab = "Grados (Celcius)",
  col = "blue",       
  pch = 19,           
  cex = 0.5,          
  cex.main = 1.5,     
  cex.lab = 1.2,      
  col.main = "darkred")
legend(
  "topright",                 
  legend = c(mi_min,mi_max),    
  pch = 17,
  col=c("purple","orange"),
  pt.cex = 1.5,                
  cex = 0.7,
  bty = "n"                    
)
abline(h = x_media, col = "red", lwd = 1, lty = 2)     
abline(h = Q2, col = "lightgreen", lwd = 1, lty = 3) 
abline(h = mis_deciles, col = "lightgray", lty = 1.5)
points(which.min(Temperatura_celsius), min(Temperatura_celsius), col = "purple", pch = 17, cex = 1.5)
points(which.max(Temperatura_celsius), max(Temperatura_celsius), col = "orange", pch = 17, cex = 1.5)
```

```{r}
nbreaks=10;
miscolores <- rainbow(25,0.85);
h <- hist(Temperatura_celsius, breaks = nbreaks, col= miscolores, 
          main = 'Temperatura',
          xlab="Grados Celsius ",
          ylab="Frecuencias")
text(h$mids, h$counts, labels = h$counts, pos = 3, cex = 0.4, 
     col = "black")
nl <- length(h$counts); 
legend(
  "topright",                  # ubicación
  legend = h$counts,    # etiquetas
  fill = miscolores,
  col = miscolores,    # colores (uno por cada símbolo)
  pt.cex = 1.5,                # tamaño de los símbolos
  cex = 0.7,
  bty = "n"                    # sin borde en la caja
)
```

```{r}
nbreaks=10;
h2 <- hist(Temperatura_celsius, breaks = nbreaks, col= miscolores, 
           main = 'Temperatura',
           xlab="Grados Celcius",
           ylab="Frecuencias",
           ylim=c(0,max(h$counts)*1.5))
text(h$mids, h$counts, labels = h$counts, pos = 3, cex = 0.8, 
     col = "black")
nl <- length(h$counts); 
legend(
  "topright",                
  legend = h$counts,    
  fill = miscolores,
  col = miscolores,    
  pt.cex = 1.5,               
  cex = 0.5,
  bty = "n"                    
)
```

```{r}
h3 <- hist(Temperatura_celsius, 
           breaks = nbreaks, 
           col= miscolores, 
           main = 'Temperatura en Grados Celcius',
           xlab="Grados Celcius",
           ylab="Porcentaje",
           ylim=c(0,max(h$density)*1.5),
           probability=TRUE)
porcentajes <- h3$counts/sum(h3$counts)*100

text(h3$mids, 
     h3$density, 
     labels = paste0(round(porcentajes,1),"%"),
     pos = 3, 
     cex = 0.8, 
     col = "black")

nl <- length(h3$counts); (nl)
legend(
  "topright",                
  legend = paste0(round(porcentajes,1),"%"),
  fill = miscolores,
  cex = 0.5,
  bty = "n"                   
)
```

```{r}
nbreaks <- 10
intervalos <- cut(Temperatura_celsius, breaks = nbreaks); (intervalos)
tabla <- table(intervalos); (tabla)
porcentajes <- round(prop.table(tabla) * 100, 1); (porcentajes)
pie(tabla,
    main = "Temperatura ",
    col = rainbow(length(tabla)),
    labels = paste0(porcentajes, "%"))
```

```{r}
##---- Grafica combinada ----
nbreaks <- 10
h <- hist(Temperatura_celsius, breaks = nbreaks, plot = FALSE)
hist(Temperatura_celsius,
     breaks = nbreaks,
     col = "lightblue",
     main = "Histograma y Ojiva (%)",
     xlab = "Grados Celcius",
     ylab = "Frecuencia")
freq_acum_pct <- cumsum(h$counts) / sum(h$counts) * 100
x_vals <- h$breaks[-1]
par(new = TRUE)
plot(x_vals, freq_acum_pct,
     type = "o", pch = 19, lwd = 2, col = "red",
     axes = FALSE, xlab = "", ylab = "",
     xlim = range(h$breaks), ylim = c(0, 100))
axis(4)                           
```
